title: Best of British: MG
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobile industry and trade
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Automobile industry and trade
description: Episode of Series "Best of British". Twenty years after the MG factory was closed down, its parent company successfully revived the make. This documentary takes a detailed look at every signigicant MG ever made, from the earliest Midget in the twenties through the T-types, the MG-A and the company's biggest seller so far, the MG-B. It also includes interviews with enthusiasts and designers, a visit to MG headquarters and rare archival footage of races and rallies.
